item.title: 13 years of moving Software Engineering forward
item.description: Technical Leadership AI for Code - Engineered a transformative AI model for code and developed it into a product that automatically reviews code for all Google engineers (blogpost). Software testing - Groundbreaking coverage infrastructure (paper) sped up code reviews at Google by 5% and reduced the code review costs by 11% (paper). Invented an entirely new type of code coverage, Productive Coverage (paper) that further reduced code review cost by further 2% and improved code and test quality.
